Class FixedContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.Container<IFixedComponent>
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.container.FixedContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IContainer<IFixedComponent>, IPopupDisplayer

    public class FixedContainer
extends Container<IFixedComponent>
implements IPopupDisplayer
    Container with contents arranged at will.
